title: Russia pummels Kyiv ahead of Zelensky-Trump meeting
summary: Russia pummelled Ukraine's capital with drones and missiles on Saturday, killing a woman and cutting power to hundreds of thousands, ahead of President Volodymyr Zelensky's latest talks with US leader Donald Trump. Zelensky said Russia’s attack on Ukraine shows that Russia does “not want to end the war”. FRANCE 24's Douglas Herbert gives us his analysis.
